import Sidebar, { SidebarTabs, SidebarTab, SidebarPanels, SidebarPanel, SidebarFooter } from ".";
import Icon from "../Icon";
import Box from "../Box";
import { Meta, Story, Preview, Props } from "@storybook/addon-docs/blocks";

<Meta title="Components/Sidebar" component={Sidebar} />

# Sidebar

Sidebar component for app layout. Panels support any content you'd like to put in them and the panel will scroll vertically if the content is taller than browser height.

Ensure to use an appropriate icon for each tab so that the intent of that tab section is conveyed as best as possible, e.g. filter icon for filters, cog icon for settings.

        </SidebarTab>
        <SidebarTab>
          <Icon icon={["fas", "info-circle"]} size="lg" />
        </SidebarTab>
        <SidebarTab>
          <Icon icon={["fas", "cog"]} size="lg" />
        </SidebarTab>

## Upgrading

This is a **breaking change** from the old `Sidebar` component, as the syntax has changed. Please use the following guide to convert from the old usage to the current usage.

| **old orca**        | **new ORCS** |
| ------------------- | ------------ |
| `Sidebar.Container` | `Sidebar`    |
| `Sidebar.Tabs`      | `Tabs`       |
| `Sidebar.Tab`       | `Tab`        |
| `Sidebar.Panels`    | `Panels`     |
| `Sidebar.Panel`     | `Panel`      |
| `Sidebar.Footer`    | `Footer`     |
